```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
library(furrr)

```



```{r}

get_files <- function(path = "./data/", pattern = "training-session-2014.+.json") {
  dir(path, pattern = pattern, full.names = T) |> 
  as.list() |> 
    future_map(\(x) fromJSON(x)) 
}

```

# data

```{r}
df <- get_files() |> enframe()

df2 <- df |> pull(value) |> map_df(\(x) chuck(x)) |> type_convert()
```
